subject: Junit
msgSnippet: Dear All, I am a new member of this group. I have a question for u people. I have a method which overwrites value of a private variable. This method is public
messageBody:
Dear All,
I am a new member of this group. I have a question for u people.
I have a method which overwrites value of a private variable. This
method is public and I need to test that method. Is it ok to set the
value of the private var using reflection and then check the method
in the test case ?
